ReportQuery.Fields: a.BA1_MUNICI, a.BA1_ESTADO, NVL(c.BIB_DESCRI, 'FALTA CADASTRAR') as BIB_DESCRI, plano.BI3_DESCRI, SUM(DECODE(a.BA1_SEXO, '1', 1, 0)) qtd_masc, SUM(DECODE(a.BA1_SEXO, '2', 1, 0)) qtd_fem, SUM(CASE WHEN trunc((SYSDATE - to_date(a.BA1_DATNAS,'YYYYMMDD'))/365, 0) between 0 and 18 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) qtd_0_18, SUM(CASE WHEN trunc((SYSDATE - to_date(a.BA1_DATNAS,'YYYYMMDD'))/365, 0) between 19 and 23 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) qtd_19_23, SUM(CASE WHEN trunc((SYSDATE - to_date(a.BA1_DATNAS,'YYYYMMDD'))/365, 0) between 24 and 28 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) qtd_24_28, SUM(CASE WHEN trunc((SYSDATE - to_date(a.BA1_DATNAS,'YYYYMMDD'))/365, 0) between 29 and 33 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) qtd_29_33, SUM(CASE WHEN trunc((SYSDATE - to_date(a.BA1_DATNAS,'YYYYMMDD'))/365, 0) between 34 and 38 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) qtd_34_38, SUM(CASE WHEN trunc((SYSDATE - to_date(a.BA1_DATNAS,'YYYYMMDD'))/365, 0) between 39 and 43 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) qtd_39_43, SUM(CASE WHEN trunc((SYSDATE - to_date(a.BA1_DATNAS,'YYYYMMDD'))/365, 0) between 44 and 48 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) qtd_44_48, SUM(CASE WHEN trunc((SYSDATE - to_date(a.BA1_DATNAS,'YYYYMMDD'))/365, 0) between 49 and 53 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) qtd_49_53, SUM(CASE WHEN trunc((SYSDATE - to_date(a.BA1_DATNAS,'YYYYMMDD'))/365, 0) between 54 and 58 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) qtd_54_58, SUM(CASE WHEN trunc((SYSDATE - to_date(a.BA1_DATNAS,'YYYYMMDD'))/365, 0) > 59 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) qtd_59, COUNT(a.BA1_MATEMP) qtd_total, null faixa_etaria, null ds_parentesco, null dt_inicio_vigencia, null dt_termino_vigencia
ReportQuery.From: VW_PR_FAMILIA_ATUAL f, VW_PR_USUARIO_ATUAL a, VW_PR_REGIAO c, VW_PR_GRAU_PARENTESCO p, VW_PR_VIDA_ATUAL d, VW_PR_PRODUTO_SAUDE plano
ReportQuery.FixedFilter: trim(f.BA3_CODINT) = trim(a.BA1_CODINT) AND trim(f.BA3_CODEMP) = trim(a.BA1_CODEMP) AND trim(f.BA3_MATRIC) = trim(a.BA1_MATRIC) AND trim(f.BA3_YREGIO) = c.BIB_CODREG (+) AND trim(a.BA1_MATEMP) NOT LIKE ('99999%') AND a.BA1_DATBLO = ' ' --PLANO VIGENTE AND trim(a.BA1_GRAUPA) = p.BRP_CODIGO (+) AND trim(a.BA1_MATVID) = trim(d.BTS_MATVID) AND trim(f.BA3_CODPLA) = trim(plano.BI3_CODIGO)
ReportQuery.Filters:
ReportFilterQuery> regional trim(f.BA3_YREGIO) IN (:regional)
uf trim(a.BA1_ESTADO) IN (:uf)
parentesco replace(trim(a.BA1_GRAUPA), '00', '01') IN (:parentesco)
plano trim(plano.BI3_CODIGO) IN (:plano)
deficiente ((trim(d.BTS_DEFFIS) IN ('1', 'S') and (:deficiente) = 'S') or (trim(d.BTS_DEFFIS) IN ('0', 'N', '') and (:deficiente) = 'N'))
estudante ((trim(d.BTS_UNIVER) IN ('1', 'S') and (:estudante) = 'S') or (trim(d.BTS_UNIVER) IN ('0', 'N', '') and (:estudante) = 'N'))
